attributes.action: CRPS/RSD awareness among frontline NHS staff
attributes.additional_details:
Chronic Regional Pain Syndrome/Regional Sympathetic Dystrophy (CRPS/RSD) is conditional that is little known amongst front line medical staff, mainly GPs.

If diagnosed within 3 months, the chance of going into remission is at its greatest.

Until I was diagnosed, none of the doctors at my GP surgery had ever heard of it as it wasn't covered in their training - and some have admitted they have had to google it!

Please can CRPS/RSD training be included in their training.
